p: A common misconception in the general population is that all microorganisms are associated with human diseases [ 31]. Integrating giant viruses into the classroom represents a way to expand knowledge and dispel the notion that viruses are solely human pathogens. Indeed, giant viruses highlight that all organisms can be infected with viruses. Besides, giant viruses can represent tools to help the general public understand the importance of microorganisms, their evolutionary biology and ecology in the ecosystem, and their ancestry. With this material, we believe the educator can explore the revolutionary aspects of these viruses and create an inspiring learning environment. This is intended to be a simple but useful material for teaching virology. It can and should be associated with other educational strategies, including other hands-on lessons, according to the educatorâ€™s plan and institution resources.
